channel.title: Help with some errors
channel.description:
Ok, so I'm really crappy at making Graphical User Interfaces. But I'm good at actually coding stuff that runs in DOS.
So, I got an error when making a GUI program and I don't know what to do. It compiles ok, but won't run ok. Image of Error: [IMG]http://i19.tinypic.com/67hj76b.png[/img]
The JAVA Source Code is attached. Thanks to who ever helps me.

item.title: Help with some errors
item.dc:creator: @deadly72 deadly72
item.description:
@deadly72 wrote:

[quote=“I Am Olan14, post:3, topic:118432”][quote author=yakman link=topic=167788.msg1559638#msg1559638 date=1183264685]
its cause when you first construct a text field, the string inside it is “”, since you try to parse it to integer just after, that cant be done, so it throws that exception
[/quote]

Well, when would I parse it then?
if I parse it too far down it’ll say cannot find symbol.[/quote]

you need to parse when your string isnt empty or null

Read full topic

its cause when you first construct a text field, the string inside it is “”, since you try to parse it to integer just after, that cant be done, so it throws that exception
